sentence.Network_en: Such material can confine water in an artesian aquifer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的介质能把水控制在承压含水层中.

sentence.Network_en: Sometime the term artesian is used to denote a confined aquifer.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候人们也用自流含水层这一术语表示承压含水层.

sentence.Network_en: Chemically, elements like ? artesian ( potassium ) and aluminum are added and taken away.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学方面, 像钾和铝这样的物质被加入到岩石中或从其中流失.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French artésien 'from Artois' (see Artois),where such wells were first made

means.word_mean: 1. (of water) rising to the surface under internal hydrostatic pressure;

abbreviation.mean_en: artesian well (of the type originating in Artois, France)
